ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rabbit: Gentle, quiet, elegant, and alert; quick and skillful.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dragon: Confident, intelligent, enthusiastic, and a natural leader.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Horse: Lively, active, energetic, and loves to be in a crowd.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Goat: Mild-mannered, shy, stable, sympathetic, and amicable.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rooste: Observant, hardworking, resourceful, courageous, and talented.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dog: Loyal, honest, amiable, kind, cautious, and prudent.
MayanHoroscopePage.title: Mayan Horoscope
MayanHoroscopePage.subtitle: Discover the ancient insights of Mayan astrology.
MayanHoroscopePage.comingSoon: More Mayan tools and calculations coming soon!
MayanHoroscopePage.question: Essential Question:
MayanHoroscopePage.kinCalculatorDescript: The Mayan Kin is a unit of time and energy in the Tzolkin (sacred Mayan calendar). It represents your personal galactic signature, combining the energy of a Solar Seal and a Galactic Tone, offering insights into your purpose and life path.
MayanHoroscopePage.selectDatePrompt: Select your birth date to discover your Mayan Kin.
MayanHoroscopePage.errorCalculatingKin: Error calculating your Kin. Please check the date and try again.
MayanHoroscopePage.showCalculationExplan: See how your Kin is calculated
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep1: Base Date: July 26, 1987 (Kin 1: 1 Imix - Magnetic Dragon) is used as the starting point in the Dreamspell count.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep2: Days Elapsed: We calculate the total number of days between the base date and your birth date.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep3: Kin Number: Using modulo 260 (total kins in the Tzolkin), we get your Kin number (1-260). Simplified formula: Kin = ((DaysSinceBase + BaseKin - 1) % 260 + 260) % 260 + 1.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep4: Solar Seal (Nahual): Derived from the Kin number using modulo 20: (Kin - 1) % 20.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep5: Galactic Tone: Derived from the Kin number using modulo 13: (Kin - 1) % 13.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainNote: This is a modern interpretation (Dreamspell) of the Mayan Tzolkin. Other traditional counts exist.

GalacticTone.Magnetic.name: Magnetic
GalacticTone.Magnetic.question: What is my purpose?
GalacticTone.Magnetic.interpretation: The Magnetic Tone is the beginning, the one that attracts purpose. It unifies all parts of your being to focus on a clear goal. Today, ask yourself: What is my true intention? What do I want to attract into my life?
GalacticTone.Lunar.name: Lunar
GalacticTone.Lunar.question: What are my challenges?
GalacticTone.Lunar.interpretation: The Lunar Tone reveals duality and challenges. It helps you identify the obstacles you need to overcome to achieve your purpose. Today, reflect: What polarities exist in my situation? What are the challenges that strengthen me?
GalacticTone.Electric.name: Electric
GalacticTone.Electric.question: How can I best serve?
GalacticTone.Electric.interpretation: The Electric Tone activates service. It is energy in motion, the spark that ignites action. It asks you how you can put your talents at the service of a greater purpose. Today, consider: How can I activate my resources? In what way does my service benefit others?
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.name: Self-Existing
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.question: What is the form of action?
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.interpretation: The Self-Existing Tone defines the form of action. It gives structure and measure to your purpose. It helps you establish the foundations and understand how to manifest your ideas. Today, think: What is the most effective form for my action? What patterns and measures do I need to establish?
GalacticTone.Overtone.name: Overtone
GalacticTone.Overtone.question: How can I empower myself?
GalacticTone.Overtone.interpretation: The Overtone Tone commands radiance and inner power. It gathers resources and gives you the authority to shine. Today, focus on: How can I gather my strengths and resources? In what way do I radiate my personal power?
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.name: Rhythmic
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.question: How do I organize for equality?
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.interpretation: The Rhythmic Tone organizes for equality and balance. It helps you find balance in the flow of life and manage challenges organically. Today, seek: How can I balance my life and my actions? How do I organize my environment for harmony?
GalacticTone.Resonant.name: Resonant
GalacticTone.Resonant.question: How can I attune my service to others?
GalacticTone.Resonant.interpretation: The Resonant Tone channels attunement and inspiration. It connects you to the source of wisdom and allows you to vibrate in harmony with the universe. Today, attune to: What truly inspires me? How can I align my being with my highest purpose?
GalacticTone.Galactic.name: Galactic
GalacticTone.Galactic.question: Do I live what I believe?
GalacticTone.Galactic.interpretation: The Galactic Tone models integrity and harmony. It invites you to live according to your beliefs and act with coherence. Today, examine: Do my actions reflect my values? Am I living in integrity with my truth?
GalacticTone.Solar.name: Solar
GalacticTone.Solar.question: How do I achieve my purpose?
GalacticTone.Solar.interpretation: The Solar Tone pulses intention and realization. It gives you the final push to manifest your purpose and achieve your goals. Today, ask yourself: How can I direct my energy towards the realization of my intention? What concrete steps should I take?
GalacticTone.Planetary.name: Planetary
GalacticTone.Planetary.question: How do I perfect what I do?
GalacticTone.Planetary.interpretation: The Planetary Tone perfects manifestation. It produces what you have intended, making your vision tangible. Today, focus on: How can I improve and perfect my creation? What is manifesting through me?
GalacticTone.Spectral.name: Spectral
GalacticTone.Spectral.question: How do I release and let go?
GalacticTone.Spectral.interpretation: The Spectral Tone dissolves and liberates. It helps you release what no longer serves, disintegrate old structures, and open space for the new. Today, consider: What do I need to release in my life? How can I let go of ties and limitations?
GalacticTone.Crystal.name: Crystal
GalacticTone.Crystal.question: How can I dedicate to cooperation?
GalacticTone.Crystal.interpretation: The Crystal Tone dedicates to cooperation and universalization. It teaches you to share your gifts and work together for a greater good. Today, reflect: How can I collaborate with others? In what way do my actions contribute to the community?
GalacticTone.Cosmic.name: Cosmic
GalacticTone.Cosmic.question: How do I expand my joy and love?
GalacticTone.Cosmic.interpretation: The Cosmic Tone transcends with presence and endurance. It is the return to the origin and the expansion of consciousness. It invites you to live fully in the present and to radiate love and joy. Today, experience: How can I be more present? How do I expand my joy and love without limits?

DreamWizard.step1.title: Describe your Dream
DreamWizard.step1.description: Narrate the main story of your dream in as much detail as possible.
DreamWizard.step1.placeholder: I was in a dark forest and suddenly started flying over a city made of clouds...
DreamWizard.step2.title: People or Beings
DreamWizard.step2.description: Who appeared in your dream? (e.g., family, strangers, talking animals)
DreamWizard.step2.placeholder: My mother, an old friend, a fox that was guiding me...
DreamWizard.step3.title: Places and Scenery
DreamWizard.step3.description: Where did the dream take place? (e.g., childhood home, an unknown place, outer space)
DreamWizard.step3.placeholder: On a black sand beach, inside a crystal castle...
DreamWizard.step4.title: Dominant Emotions
DreamWizard.step4.description: What emotions did you feel most strongly during the dream?
DreamWizard.step4.placeholder: Joy, fear, confusion, a sense of peace...
DreamWizard.step5.title: Symbols and Objects
DreamWizard.step5.description: Were there any objects, colors, or symbols that repeated or stood out?
DreamWizard.step5.placeholder: A golden key, a stopped clock, water everywhere...
DreamWizard.step6.title: Dream Intensity
DreamWizard.step6.description: How vivid or intense was your dream?

ZodiacDetail.title: Details for {signName}
ZodiacDetail.Aries.title: Characteristics of Aries
ZodiacDetail.Aries.description: Aries is the first sign of the zodiac, a pioneer full of energy and enthusiasm. Ruled by Mars, the planet of war and action, Aries are natural leaders, brave, and always ready for a new challenge.
ZodiacDetail.Aries.love: In love, Aries is direct, passionate, and a bit impatient. They love the thrill of the chase and look for a partner who can keep up with their energetic and adventurous pace.
ZodiacDetail.Aries.work: In the workplace, Aries shines in leadership roles. They are excellent at initiating projects and motivating others, though they may struggle with follow-through and minute details.
ZodiacDetail.Taurus.title: Characteristics of Taurus
ZodiacDetail.Taurus.description: Taurus, ruled by Venus, is the sign of stability, sensuality, and perseverance. They are lovers of beauty, comfort, and the pleasures of life, with unwavering determination.
ZodiacDetail.Taurus.love: Taurus is a loyal, patient, and very physical lover. They seek security and stability in their relationships. They value honesty and reliability above all else.
ZodiacDetail.Taurus.work: Taurus is the steady and reliable worker. They are excellent at building and bringing projects to completion. Their patience and determination make them invaluable on any team.
ZodiacDetail.Gemini.title: Characteristics of Gemini
ZodiacDetail.Gemini.description: Gemini is the communicator of the zodiac, ruled by Mercury. They are curious, adaptable, and intellectual, always seeking new information and experiences.
ZodiacDetail.Gemini.love: In love, Gemini needs constant mental stimulation. They look for a partner who is both their best friend and their lover, someone they can talk to about everything.
ZodiacDetail.Gemini.work: Gemini thrives in dynamic and communicative environments. They are excellent in sales, marketing, and any role that requires wit and adaptability.
ZodiacDetail.Cancer.title: Characteristics of Cancer
ZodiacDetail.Cancer.description: Ruled by the Moon, Cancer is the nurturer of the zodiac. They are incredibly intuitive, emotional, and protective of their loved ones.
ZodiacDetail.Cancer.love: Cancer seeks emotional security and a deep bond. They are tender and devoted lovers who dream of building a home and family.
ZodiacDetail.Cancer.work: Cancer performs well in roles that involve caring for others. Their intuition gives them a unique advantage in managing and supporting their colleagues.
ZodiacDetail.Leo.title: Characteristics of Leo
ZodiacDetail.Leo.description: Ruled by the Sun, Leo is the king or queen of the zodiac. They are charismatic, generous, big-hearted, and love to be the center of attention.
ZodiacDetail.Leo.love: In love, Leo is dramatic, romantic, and extremely loyal. They love to spoil their partner and expect to be adored in return.
ZodiacDetail.Leo.work: Leo is a natural-born leader. Their charisma and confidence make them excellent at motivating teams and representing their company.
ZodiacDetail.Virgo.title: Characteristics of Virgo
ZodiacDetail.Virgo.description: Virgo, ruled by Mercury, is the perfectionist of the zodiac. They are analytical, practical, and have a keen eye for detail.
ZodiacDetail.Virgo.love: Virgo shows their love through acts of service. They seek a partner who appreciates their dedication and their analytical mind.
ZodiacDetail.Virgo.work: No one is better than Virgo at organizing systems and optimizing processes. Their attention to detail is second to none.
ZodiacDetail.Libra.title: Characteristics of Libra
ZodiacDetail.Libra.description: Ruled by Venus, Libra is the sign of balance, harmony, and justice. They are diplomatic, sociable, and lovers of beauty.
ZodiacDetail.Libra.love: Libra craves a balanced partnership. They are romantic and seek a partner with whom to share a beautiful and harmonious life.
ZodiacDetail.Libra.work: Libra excels in roles that require negotiation and diplomacy. They are excellent mediators and social strategists.
ZodiacDetail.Scorpio.title: Characteristics of Scorpio
ZodiacDetail.Scorpio.description: Scorpio, ruled by Pluto and Mars, is the sign of intensity, transformation, and power. They are passionate, insightful, and extremely loyal.
ZodiacDetail.Scorpio.love: Scorpio seeks a soulmate connection. Their love is deep, intense, and all-or-nothing. Trust is paramount.
ZodiacDetail.Scorpio.work: Scorpio is a formidable strategist. Their ability to see beneath the surface makes them excellent detectives and researchers.
ZodiacDetail.Sagittarius.title: Characteristics of Sagittarius
ZodiacDetail.Sagittarius.description: Sagittarius, the archer ruled by Jupiter, is the explorer of the zodiac. They are optimistic, freedom-loving, and always in search of knowledge and adventure.
ZodiacDetail.Sagittarius.love: Sagittarius needs a partner who shares their love for adventure and freedom. Their love is optimistic and based on friendship.
ZodiacDetail.Sagittarius.work: Sagittarius is excellent for roles involving travel, education, and philosophy. Their optimistic vision can inspire entire teams.
ZodiacDetail.Capricorn.title: Characteristics of Capricorn
ZodiacDetail.Capricorn.description: Ruled by Saturn, Capricorn is the master builder of the zodiac. They are disciplined, responsible, and ambitious, always with their eyes on the top.
ZodiacDetail.Capricorn.love: Capricorn takes love very seriously. They look for a partner who is their partner in life, someone with whom to build a solid and secure future.
ZodiacDetail.Capricorn.work: Capricorn is destined for management and leadership. Their discipline and long-term focus make them excellent strategists and directors.
ZodiacDetail.Aquarius.title: Characteristics of Aquarius
ZodiacDetail.Aquarius.description: Aquarius, ruled by Uranus, is the visionary and humanitarian of the zodiac. They are original, independent, and always thinking about the future.
ZodiacDetail.Aquarius.love: Aquarius looks for a friend first and a lover second. They need a partner who respects their independence and shares their humanitarian ideals.
ZodiacDetail.Aquarius.work: Aquarius thrives in fields related to technology, science, and social causes. Their innovative mind is always one step ahead.
ZodiacDetail.Pisces.title: Characteristics of Pisces
ZodiacDetail.Pisces.description: Ruled by Neptune, Pisces is the dreamer and mystic of the zodiac. They are compassionate, artistic, and have a deep connection to the spiritual world.
ZodiacDetail.Pisces.love: Pisces seeks a soulmate union. They are incredibly romantic and need a partner who understands their deep sensitivity and dream world.
ZodiacDetail.Pisces.work: Pisces excels in creative and healing professions. Their empathy and imagination are their greatest professional gifts.
